title: 7-day cancellation with full session charge
short_summary: Reserved time is exclusive; unless a true emergency, less than 7 days’ notice triggers full session fee before rescheduling.
normalized_clause_en: Reserved sessions are exclusive to the Client. Unless a true emergency, cancellations require at least 7 days’ notice. If less notice is given, the full session fee is charged and must be paid in full before scheduling further appointments.
source_quote: 7-day cancellation policy... Unless proper cancellation notice... the fee for the entire session will be charged and must be paid in full prior to the scheduling of any further appointments.
notes_for_llm: Strict and provider-leaning; consider a one-time courtesy waiver; clarify what counts as emergency.

title: Payment due at end of session; non-refundable
short_summary: Collects payment at session end; accepts check/cash/major cards; fees are non-refundable.
normalized_clause_en: Payment is due at the end of each session. Acceptable methods include check, money order, cash, and major credit cards. Fees are non-refundable.
source_quote: Payment is due at the end of each session... all fees are non-refundable.
notes_for_llm: If market expects refunds, consider partial refunds or credits; ensure compliance with local consumer rules.

title: Client presence and minimum package
short_summary: Client must be present to make decisions; minimum booking is a full-day package with one organizer.
normalized_clause_en: Client must be present to make decisions during organizing. A minimum booking is a full-day package with one organizer; shorter ad-hoc sessions are not offered.
source_quote: Do I have to be present... Yes... Can I schedule organizing service for a couple of hours? Our minimum package is a day package with 1 professional organizer.
notes_for_llm: Make minimum clear upfront to avoid sticker shock; adjust hours based on market norms.

title: Travel and shopping fees
short_summary: Travel up to 1 hour is free; beyond may be billed; organizer carries basic tools; special supplies incur a shopping fee.
normalized_clause_en: Travel within one hour is included; trips beyond may incur a travel fee. Provider carries standard organizing tools; if specific supplies are needed, a shopping fee will be charged to Client.
source_quote: We will travel up to 1 hour without assessing a travel fee charge... Clients needing specific supplies will be charged a shopping fee.
notes_for_llm: Define rate/thresholds; require budget approval for shopping.

title: Privacy, confidentiality, and photo consent
short_summary: Commits to confidentiality/ethics; allows anonymous use of testimonials and before/after photos with client review and veto.
normalized_clause_en: Provider adheres to strict confidentiality and industry codes of ethics. Client information is kept private. Client permits Provider to use anonymized testimonials and before/after photos with identifying details removed in marketing, but Provider will show the photo to Client first and will not publish if Client objects.

source.page_title: Policies You Should Know - Clever Girl Organizing

source_quote: Clients can be assured of absolute privacy... adheres strictly to the NAPO Code of Ethics... permission to use, anonymously... Before & After pictures... You will be shown the photo before it is used, and if you object... that’s as far as it goes!
notes_for_llm: If clients are privacy-sensitive, make photo use opt-in; keep records of consent.

title: 3-day cooling-off for door-to-door/temporary sales (FTC)
short_summary: If sold at a residence (≥$25) or temporary site (≥$130), client may cancel until midnight of the third business day; provider must give notice/form and refund within 10 business days.
normalized_clause_en: For sales made at the Client’s residence (≥ $25) or a temporary location (≥ $130), Client may cancel until midnight of the third business day. Provider must supply written notice of this right and a cancellation form at signing, and refund all payments within 10 business days upon timely cancellation.
source_quote: Consumers who buy goods or services at their homes... can cancel within three business days... provide cancellation forms... refund within 10 business days.
notes_for_llm: Applies only if signed at home/temporary site; if immediate start is requested, obtain waiver or delay; watch stricter state laws.
